About me

After graduating from Dalhousie University with a degree in mining engineering, I quickly realized that mining was not an industry I was passionate about while software development was. I have self taught proficiency in Python and Ruby, complemented by a full stack web development course at Bitmaker Labs, focusing on Ruby on Rails and Javascript. Other note worthy hobbies of mine are game development, 3D modelling, and tinkering with arduinos.
